planet.name: HD 100546 b
planet.description: HD 100546 is a Herbig Ae/Be star. High contrast observations of the circumstellar disk reveal an emmision source at a distance of 68 astronomical units. The most likely explanation is a planet in the process of forming. If confirmed, HD100546 b would be a unique laboratory to study the formation process of a new planetary system, with one giant planet currently forming in the disk and a second planet possibly orbiting in the disk gap at a smaller separation.
